name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Raven Strike
name_original: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Raven Strike
description:
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Raven Strike is an action-shooter game developed by Ubisoft Paris. It came out on 12-09-2012. Ubisoft Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier - Raven Strike is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
